short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: News Headlines On Your New Tab Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of the latest headlines throughout your day with this extension dedicated to those who love to follow the latest headlines. Scroll through the latest news directly from you new tab page. 

This extension replaces your default Chrome new tab page and replaces it with a new tab page that includes a web search powered by Yahoo! and a module that contains the latest news headlines.

Permissions Requested: 

Storage: News headlines are temporarily stored and displayed on the new tab page.

Hosts: Host permission is requested for Google news rss feed.

--
Privacy Policy: https://newsloverstab.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://newsloverstab.com/terms-of-service/
